name: BrainBumpers Deluxe
description:
brainbumpers is a brain booster game.

brainbumpers is a fun memory puzzle-filled physics game inspired by the sixth episode of the TV Series Brain Games Season 3.

The objective of the game is to remember the positions and orientations of "bumpers" and to later recall which box will the ball fall as guided by these bumpers.

With repeated playing, it is expected to boost the brain's memory/retention power and improve your mind's pattern recognition ability.
